title: Is Germany a shadow of its former self? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not a shadow … but a lot of things had been better in the past like: roads&bridgesEducationHealth careArmed forcesSocial wellfareBalance between rich/poorDeutsche Bahn / railroad system

It depends on which former self you mean! At the moment, it has its shortcomings like all countries do. However, it's relatively stable and safe to live in. It offers no threat to the security of other countries and it has not made any serious enemies. That's probably about as successful as a country in the middle of Europe has ever been.
